## FeaturedSnippetDirectAnswer.value property

The result of the direct answer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
value?: T;
```

## Remarks

A value will not be present if the [DirectAnswer.fieldType](./search-headless.directanswer.fieldtype.md) is 'rich\_text'.
